Toyota.Name: Toyota Celica Turbo IMSA GTO
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Celica Turbo IMSA GTO is a legendary race car from the IMSA GTO series, developed by All-American Racers. With a powerful turbocharged engine and aggressive aero, it dominated the championship in the late 1980s with raw speed and handling.

Toyota.Name: Toyota MR2 W20
Toyota.global_information: The engine is located in the middle of the car, behind the driver's seat, providing excellent weight balance and improved handling. It delivers a characteristic sporty driving feel, perfectly complemented by the mid-engine configuration. Often features pop-up headlights (depending on the version), a sturdy coupe or T-top (removable roof) styling, and a smoother appearance compared to the first generation.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Hilux Double Cab
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Hilux Double Cab is known for its durability and off-road capability. It features a robust 3.0L I6 hybrid engine, providing a balance of power and efficiency. The vehicle is equipped with a 6-Speed Manual transmission, making it suitable for various driving conditions. Its spacious interior accommodates five passengers comfortably, making it a practical choice for both work and leisure

Toyota.Name: Toyota Century Royal
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Century Royal is a luxury sedan known for its elegant design and powerful 5.0L V12 gasoline engine. It features a smooth 6-Speed Automatic transmission and delivers 423 hp. The vehicle comfortably seats five passengers and is often associated with high status and prestige.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Hilux
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Hilux is a reliable and versatile pickup truck known for its durability and off-road capabilities. It features a range of diesel engines, including 2.6L and 2.8L options, paired with a 6-Speed Automatic transmission. The vehicle offers seating for four passengers and is popular for both work and recreational use.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Land Cruiser 2022
Toyota.global_information: The 2022 Toyota Land Cruiser is a full-size SUV known for its off-road capabilities and luxurious features. It is powered by a robust 3.5L V6 twin-turbo gasoline engine that delivers 409 hp, paired with a smooth 10-Speed Automatic transmission. The vehicle offers spacious seating for up to seven passengers, making it ideal for both family adventures and rugged terrains.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Land Cruiser 2025
Toyota.global_information: The 2025 Toyota Land Cruiser is a full-size SUV known for its off-road capabilities and luxurious features. It is powered by a robust 3.5L V6 twin-turbo gasoline engine that delivers 409 hp, paired with a smooth 10-Speed Automatic transmission. The vehicle offers spacious seating for up to seven passengers, making it ideal for both family adventures and rugged terrains.

Toyota.Name: Toyota AE86 Black Limited
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota AE86 Black Limited is a high-performance sports car known for its sleek design and powerful engine. It features a 2.0L inline-six gasoline engine that delivers 170 hp, paired with a 6-Speed Automatic transmission. The vehicle offers seating for four passengers and is celebrated for its agility, speed, and driving dynamics.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Auris Wagon
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Auris Wagon is a high-performance sports car known for its sleek design and powerful engine. It features a 1.8L VVT-i hybrid engine that delivers 200 hp, paired with an 8-Speed Automatic transmission. The vehicle offers seating for four passengers and is celebrated for its agility, speed, and driving dynamics.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Camry 2020
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Camry is a reliable midsize sedan renowned for its comfort, fuel efficiency, and hybrid technology. It features a 2.5L hybrid engine delivering smooth performance and excellent economy, making it a top choice for families and daily commuters.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Corolla Levin AE92 GT Apex
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Corolla Levin AE92 GT Apex is a classic JDM sports coupe known for its nimble handling and rev-happy 4A-GE engine. It offers exciting front-wheel-drive performance for enthusiasts seeking a lightweight, fun-to-drive car.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Fortuner 2021
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Fortuner 2021 is a rugged body-on-frame SUV built for adventure and family use. With a powerful turbo diesel engine, optional 4x4, and spacious 7-seater layout, it's popular for its durability and off-road capability.

Toyota.Name: Toyota FT1 Vision GT
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota FT1 Vision GT is a stunning concept created for Gran Turismo, featuring aggressive styling and race-inspired aerodynamics. It represents Toyota's vision of a future high-performance sports car with breathtaking design and speed.

Toyota.Name: Toyota GR Supra GT300
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota GR Supra GT300 is a Super GT race car with a powerful V8 engine and advanced aerodynamics. It delivers thrilling performance in the GT300 class, combining Supra heritage with racing precision.

Toyota.Name: Toyota GR Supra
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota GR Supra is a modern sports coupe with BMW-derived engineering and a potent turbo inline-6 engine. It offers razor-sharp handling, explosive acceleration, and iconic design for pure driving enthusiasts.

Toyota.Name: Toyota GR Yaris Rally WRC
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota GR Yaris Rally WRC is a World Rally Championship contender with all-wheel drive and a high-revving turbo engine. It brings rally-bred performance and agility to extreme conditions.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Hilux Revo Prerunner 2021
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Hilux Revo Prerunner 2021 is a tough, off-road-oriented pickup with enhanced suspension and powerful diesel engine. It's built for durability, high-speed desert running, and heavy-duty work.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Supra GT500
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Supra GT500 is a top-tier Super GT race car with extreme power and downforce. It dominates the GT500 class with cutting-edge technology and blistering speed.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Supra MK IV 1994
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Supra MK IV 1994 is an iconic JDM legend with the legendary 2JZ-GTE engine. Known for massive tuning potential, it offers incredible performance and timeless design.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Supra MK4 A80
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Supra MK4 A80 is the ultimate fourth-generation Supra, famous worldwide for its robust 2JZ engine and tuning culture. It's a true performance icon with balanced handling and raw power.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Supra
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Supra (A90) revives the legendary nameplate with modern engineering, delivering thrilling dynamics, turbocharged power, and sharp styling for a new generation of sports car fans.

Toyota.Name: Toyota TS030 Hybrid
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota TS030 Hybrid is a Le Mans prototype with hybrid technology combining a powerful V8 and electric motors. It competed fiercely in endurance racing with innovative efficiency and speed.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Van 1982
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Van 1982 is a classic rear-wheel-drive minivan from the 80s, offering practical space and reliability for families. It was Toyota's early entry into the people-mover market with simple, durable design.

Porsche.Name: 2023 Porsche 911 GT3 RS
Porsche.global_information: The 2023 Porsche 911 GT3 RS is an aerodynamic masterpiece with extreme downforce and a high-revving engine. Designed for the track, it offers razor-sharp precision and record-breaking lap times.

Porsche.Name: 2010 Porsche Panamera Turbo
Porsche.global_information: The 2010 Porsche Panamera Turbo combines grand touring luxury with blistering performance. Its twin-turbo V8 and all-wheel drive deliver supercar acceleration in a practical four-door package, redefining what a high-performance sedan can be.

Porsche.Name: 2019 Porsche Macan Turbo
Porsche.global_information: The 2019 Porsche Macan Turbo is a compact luxury SUV with supercar-like acceleration and sharp handling. It combines practicality with thrilling dynamics for an exhilarating daily driver.

Porsche.Name: Porsche 911 Carrera 4S
Porsche.global_information: The Porsche 911 Carrera 4S combines all-wheel drive grip with turbocharged performance and timeless design, offering balanced handling and everyday usability in Porsche's flagship sports car.

Porsche.Name: Porsche 911 GT2 RS 993
Porsche.global_information: The Porsche 911 GT2 RS 993 is a high-performance sports car designed for track enthusiasts. It features a naturally aspirated 4.0L flat-six engine producing 520 hp, paired with a quick-shifting 7-speed PDK transmission. The GT2 RS is renowned for its exceptional handling, aerodynamic design

Porsche.Name: 2004 Porsche Carrera GT
Porsche.global_information: The 2004 Porsche Carrera GT is a legendary mid-engine supercar with a screaming naturally aspirated V10 engine. Derived from Le Mans tech, it offers raw, analog driving thrills with exceptional handling and iconic design that remains one of the greatest sports cars ever built.

Porsche.Name: 2015 Porsche Cayman GT4
Porsche.global_information: The 2015 Porsche Cayman GT4 is a track-focused mid-engine masterpiece with a high-revving flat-six from the 911 Carrera S. It delivers razor-sharp handling, lightweight construction, and pure driving joy for enthusiasts seeking ultimate agility.

Porsche.Name: 2016 Porsche 718 Cayman S
Porsche.global_information: The 2016 Porsche 718 Cayman S revives the mid-engine legend with turbocharged punch and precise handling. It balances everyday usability with thrilling performance, making it a benchmark for affordable sports cars.

Porsche.Name: 2016 Porsche 911 Carrera S
Porsche.global_information: The 2016 Porsche 911 Carrera S offers timeless rear-engine dynamics with modern twin-turbo power. It blends iconic styling, refined performance, and everyday usability in Porsche's legendary grand tourer.

Porsche.Name: 2018 Porsche 911 GT3 RS
Porsche.global_information: The 2018 Porsche 911 GT3 RS is a hardcore track weapon with massive downforce, a screaming high-revving engine, and extreme aerodynamics. It delivers unparalleled precision and speed for the ultimate driving purist.

Porsche.Name: 2018 Porsche 911
Porsche.global_information: The 2018 Porsche 911 is the epitome of sports car evolution, blending timeless design with turbocharged performance and advanced tech for exhilarating drives on road or track.

Porsche.Name: 2019 Porsche GT2 RS Clubsport
Porsche.global_information: The 2019 Porsche GT2 RS Clubsport is an extreme track-only machine with massive power and aero. Built for circuit dominance, it pushes the limits of Porsche engineering with raw, unfiltered performance.

Porsche.Name: 2020 Porsche 718 Cayman GT4
Porsche.global_information: The 2020 Porsche 718 Cayman GT4 revives the pure driving experience with a high-revving flat-six and track-tuned chassis. It's a benchmark for mid-engine sports cars, offering razor-sharp handling and exhilarating performance.

Porsche.Name: 2020 Porsche 911 GT2 RS Clubsport 25 Manthey
Porsche.global_information: The 2020 Porsche 911 GT2 RS Clubsport 25 Manthey is a limited-edition track monster with extreme aero and power upgrades. Celebrating 25 years, it dominates circuits with unmatched speed and precision.

Porsche.Name: 2020 Porsche Taycan Turbo S
Porsche.global_information: The 2020 Porsche Taycan Turbo S is Porsche's first all-electric supercar sedan, delivering instant torque, blistering acceleration, and precise handling with cutting-edge EV technology.

Porsche.Name: 2021 Porsche 911 Turbo S 992
Porsche.global_information: The 2021 Porsche 911 Turbo S (992) is the ultimate all-weather supercar with explosive power, advanced AWD, and refined grand touring capabilities in Porsche's iconic silhouette.

Porsche.Name: 2021 Porsche Panamera Turbo S Sport Turismo
Porsche.global_information: The 2021 Porsche Panamera Turbo S Sport Turismo blends wagon practicality with supercar performance. Its twin-turbo V8 and adaptive chassis deliver thrilling drives with family-friendly space.

Porsche.Name: 2022 Porsche Cayenne Turbo GT
Porsche.global_information: The 2022 Porsche Cayenne Turbo GT is the fastest SUV ever, with track-tuned suspension, massive power, and aggressive aero for unparalleled performance in a luxury package.

Porsche.Name: 2025 Porsche Taycan Turbo GT Weissach
Porsche.global_information: The 2025 Porsche Taycan Turbo GT Weissach is the ultimate electric performance car, with over 1000 hp, lightweight construction, and extreme aero. It shatters acceleration records while delivering Porsche precision.

Porsche.Name: 1975 Porsche 911 930 Turbo
Porsche.global_information: The 1975 Porsche 911 930 Turbo pioneered turbocharging in production sports cars. With its whale-tail spoiler and raw turbo power, it's an iconic pioneer of high-performance driving.

Porsche.Name: Porsche Turbo 2
Porsche.global_information: The Porsche Turbo 2 (930 evolution) refined the original turbo legend with more power and improved drivability, cementing the 911 Turbo's status as a performance icon.

Porsche.Name: Porsche 918 Spyder 2015
Porsche.global_information: The 2015 Porsche 918 Spyder is a revolutionary plug-in hybrid hypercar with 887 hp from V8 and electric motors. It blends Le Mans tech with stunning performance and efficiency.

Porsche.Name: Porsche Taycan Turbo S
Porsche.global_information: The Porsche Taycan Turbo S is the pinnacle of electric performance, offering instant torque, blistering speed, and Porsche handling in a luxurious four-door package.

BMW.Name: BMW M4 F82 Rasor 2014
BMW.global_information: The BMW M4 F82 Razor is a custom-tuned icon with aggressive styling and boosted performance, inspired by legendary gaming rivalries.

BMW.Name: BMW M8 Competition WideBody
BMW.global_information: The BMW M8 Competition WideBody features flared fenders and aggressive aero for a bolder, more muscular presence with supercar performance.

BMW.Name: BMW M3 GTR E46 Street ACSchnitzer BlackEdition
BMW.global_information: The BMW M3 GTR E46 Street ACSchnitzer BlackEdition is a tuned street-legal version with V8 power, aggressive styling, and iconic racing heritage.

BMW.Name: 2022 BMW M440i xDrive Gran Coupe
BMW.global_information: The 2022 BMW M440i xDrive Gran Coupe blends practicality with sporty performance, offering AWD grip and turbo power in a sleek four-door package.

BMW.Name: BMW M5 CS
BMW.global_information: The BMW M5 CS is the ultimate super sedan with extreme power, lightweight upgrades, and track-focused tuning for unparalleled performance.

BMW.Name: BMW S1000RR
BMW.global_information: The BMW S1000RR is a cutting-edge superbike with blistering acceleration, advanced electronics, and track-dominating performance.

BMW.Name: 2018 BMW M4 F82 GT4
BMW.global_information: The 2018 BMW M4 F82 GT4 is a customer race car built for GT4 series, featuring a detuned but potent twin-turbo inline-6 with excellent balance and aerodynamics for amateur and professional racing success.

BMW.Name: 2018 BMW M5
BMW.global_information: The 2018 BMW M5 is a super sedan with explosive twin-turbo V8 power and all-wheel drive, blending luxury, practicality, and blistering performance for everyday thrills.

BMW.Name: 2018 BMW M8 GTE
BMW.global_information: The 2018 BMW M8 GTE is a Le Mans prototype racer with massive power and advanced aero, competing fiercely in endurance racing with BMW's cutting-edge motorsport tech.

BMW.Name: 2018 BMW X3 G01
BMW.global_information: The 2018 BMW X3 G01 is a premium compact SUV offering sharp handling, versatile powertrains, and luxurious interior for dynamic daily driving.

BMW.Name: 2019 BMW M2 Competition
BMW.global_information: The 2019 BMW M2 Competition delivers pure driving joy with a high-revving twin-turbo engine, rear-wheel drive, and compact size for agile, thrilling performance.

BMW.Name: 2019 BMW X5
BMW.global_information: The 2019 BMW X5 combines spacious luxury with powerful engines and advanced tech, offering a refined yet sporty SUV experience.

BMW.Name: 2020 BMW M8 Coupe
BMW.global_information: The 2020 BMW M8 Coupe is a luxurious grand tourer with supercar power, all-wheel drive, and elegant design for high-speed comfort and performance.

BMW.Name: 2021 BMW M4 Competition
BMW.global_information: The 2021 BMW M4 Competition offers aggressive styling, potent turbo power, and sharp handling in a modern high-performance coupe.

BMW.Name: 2022 BMW M4 CSL
BMW.global_information: The 2022 BMW M4 CSL is a lightweight, hardcore track weapon with massive power, reduced weight, and extreme aerodynamics for ultimate driving purity.

BMW.Name: 2022 BMW M4 GT3
BMW.global_information: The 2022 BMW M4 GT3 is a GT3-spec racer with advanced aero and power, dominating endurance and sprint races worldwide.

BMW.Name: 2023 BMW M3 Touring
BMW.global_information: The 2023 BMW M3 Touring revives the iconic wagon with blistering twin-turbo power, sharp handling, and practical space for enthusiasts.

BMW.Name: 2024 BMW M4 Coupe Competition
BMW.global_information: The 2024 BMW M4 Coupe Competition delivers refined aggression, explosive acceleration, and precise dynamics in BMW's flagship sports coupe.

BMW.Name: BMW G82 M4 with Adro Kit 2022
BMW.global_information: The BMW G82 M4 with ADRO widebody kit enhances the aggressive styling with flared fenders and aero upgrades for a bolder, track-ready look.

BMW.Name: BMW M1 Turbo
BMW.global_information: The BMW M1 Turbo is a wild Group 5 racer with massive turbo power, iconic wedge design, and legendary status in motorsport history.

BMW.Name: BMW M4 CSL 2023
BMW.global_information: The 2023 BMW M4 CSL is an ultra-lightweight track monster with enhanced power, carbon elements, and razor-sharp handling for pure performance.

BMW.Name: BMW M4 F82
BMW.global_information: The BMW M4 F82 revives the legendary badge with twin-turbo power, sharp dynamics, and timeless coupe design for exhilarating drives.

BMW.Name: BMW X7 M60i
BMW.global_information: The BMW X7 M60i is a flagship luxury SUV with massive V8 power, spacious interior, and commanding presence for ultimate comfort and performance.

BMW.Name: BMW M3 E30
BMW.global_information: The BMW M3 E30 is the legendary original, a lightweight, high-revving icon that defined BMW M performance and touring car racing success.

FORD.Name: 2016 Ford GT LM GTE
FORD.global_information: The 2016 Ford GT LM GTE is a Le Mans endurance racer with advanced twin-turbo V6 and extreme aerodynamics. It dominated GT racing with cutting-edge tech and legendary Ford heritage.

FORD.Name: 2005 Ford Shelby GR1
FORD.global_information: The 2005 Ford Shelby GR-1 is a stunning concept supercar inspired by the legendary Shelby Daytona Coupe. Powered by a massive 6.4L all-aluminum V10 delivering 605 hp, it features Ford GT-derived suspension and polished aluminum bodywork for breathtaking performance and timeless design.

FORD.Name: 2010 Ford F150 SVT Raptor R
FORD.global_information: The 2010 Ford F-150 SVT Raptor is a high-performance off-road beast built for desert racing. With a powerful 6.2L V8, long-travel suspension, and wide stance, it's designed for extreme terrain while offering impressive on-road capability.

FORD.Name: 2010 Ford Fusion
FORD.global_information: The 2010 Ford Fusion is a reliable midsize sedan with sharp handling and efficient engines. It offers a comfortable ride, spacious interior, and strong value for daily commuting and family use.

FORD.Name: 2010 Ford Taurus SHO
FORD.global_information: The 2010 Ford Taurus SHO is a high-performance full-size sedan with twin-turbo EcoBoost power and AWD grip. It blends luxury, space, and supercar-like acceleration for thrilling grand touring.

FORD.Name: 2011 Land Rover Range Rover Evoque
FORD.global_information: The 2011 Land Rover Range Rover Evoque is a stylish compact luxury SUV with premium design and off-road capability. It offers refined performance, upscale interior, and versatile AWD for urban and adventure driving.

FORD.Name: 2013 Ford Mustang GT
FORD.global_information: The 2013 Ford Mustang GT is a classic American muscle car with the potent Coyote 5.0L V8 delivering 420 hp. It offers raw power, sharp handling, and iconic styling for pure driving excitement.

FORD.Name: 2015 Ford Mustang GT
FORD.global_information: The 2015 Ford Mustang GT features an all-new design with independent rear suspension and a refined 5.0L V8 producing 435 hp. It delivers superior handling, modern tech, and timeless muscle car thrills.

FORD.Name: 2015 Ford Mustang RTR Spec 5 Concept
FORD.global_information: The 2015 Ford Mustang RTR Spec 5 Concept by Vaughn Gittin Jr. is an extreme drift machine with widebody flares, roll cage, and high-output V8. It's built for aggressive performance and showcases RTR's tuning prowess.

FORD.Name: 2015 Ford Mustang RTR
FORD.global_information: The 2015 Ford Mustang RTR by Vaughn Gittin Jr. adds aggressive styling, aero upgrades, and optional supercharged power up to 725 hp. It's a street-legal beast blending drift heritage with high-performance capability.

FORD.Name: 2016 Ford Mustang Shelby GT350R
FORD.global_information: The 2016 Ford Mustang Shelby GT350R is a hardcore track weapon with a high-revving 5.2L V8 and lightweight construction. It offers razor-sharp handling and race-bred performance for ultimate enthusiasts.

FORD.Name: 2016 Land Rover Range Rover Evoque Coupe
FORD.global_information: The 2016 Land Rover Range Rover Evoque Coupe combines sleek coupe styling with premium luxury and off-road prowess. It's a stylish, capable compact SUV for urban sophistication and adventure.

FORD.Name: 2017 Ford F150 Raptor
FORD.global_information: The 2017 Ford F-150 Raptor is a next-gen desert runner with twin-turbo EcoBoost power, Fox shocks, and massive ground clearance. It's built for high-speed off-road dominance with everyday usability.

FORD.Name: 2017 Ford GT Heritage Edition
FORD.global_information: The 2017 Ford GT Heritage Edition pays tribute to Le Mans legends with stunning Gulf livery and extreme aero. Powered by a 647 hp twin-turbo V6, it's a modern hypercar masterpiece.

FORD.Name: 2017 Ford GT
FORD.global_information: The 2017 Ford GT is a mid-engine hypercar with carbon-fiber construction and 647 hp twin-turbo V6. It revives Ford's Le Mans-winning legacy with breathtaking speed and advanced aerodynamics.

FORD.Name: 2018 Ford GT Heritage Edition
FORD.global_information: The 2018 Ford GT Heritage Edition honors racing history with unique livery and premium details. It delivers hypercar performance with 647 hp and track-focused engineering.

FORD.Name: 2019 Ford GT Heritage Edition
FORD.global_information: The 2019 Ford GT Heritage Edition celebrates Ford's endurance racing roots with exclusive styling. It's a limited-edition hypercar blending 647 hp power with iconic design.

FORD.Name: 2019 NASCAR Ford Mustang
FORD.global_information: The 2019 NASCAR Ford Mustang is a high-downforce stock car dominating NASCAR with massive power and aero. It brings Mustang heritage to professional racing circuits.

FORD.Name: 2020 Ford Mustang Shelby GT350R
FORD.global_information: The 2020 Ford Mustang Shelby GT350R is a track purist's dream with high-revving V8 and lightweight upgrades. It delivers exceptional handling and race-ready performance.

FORD.Name: 2021 Ford GT MK II
FORD.global_information: The 2021 Ford GT MK II is an extreme track version with enhanced aero, power, and downforce. It's a limited-edition hypercar pushing the limits of performance.

FORD.Name: 2022 NASCAR Ford Mustang Next Gen
FORD.global_information: The 2022 NASCAR Next Gen Ford Mustang introduces independent rear suspension and modern aero. It's a revolutionary stock car blending Mustang style with cutting-edge racing tech.

FORD.Name: 2023 Ford GT MK IV
FORD.global_information: The 2023 Ford GT MK IV is the ultimate track-focused evolution with massive power and aero upgrades. It's a rare, extreme hypercar for the most demanding enthusiasts.

FORD.Name: 2023 Land Rover Range Rover Sport
FORD.global_information: The 2023 Land Rover Range Rover Sport blends luxury, off-road mastery, and dynamic performance. With advanced hybrid powertrains and refined interior, it's a versatile premium SUV.

FORD.Name: 2024 Ford F150 Raptor R
FORD.global_information: The 2024 Ford F-150 Raptor R is the ultimate desert predator with a supercharged Predator V8 delivering 700 hp. It's engineered for extreme off-road speed and capability.

FORD.Name: 2024 Shelby Super Snake S650
FORD.global_information: The 2024 Shelby Super Snake S650 is an ultra-high-performance Mustang with massive supercharged power and aggressive aero. It's a limited-edition beast for ultimate street and track dominance.

FORD.Name: 2025 Ford Mustang GTD
FORD.global_information: The 2025 Ford Mustang GTD is a street-legal track monster with GT3-inspired tech, massive power, and extreme aero. It redefines American muscle with supercar-level performance.

FORD.Name: 2025 Ford Transit Courier Trend 1.5
FORD.global_information: The 2025 Ford Transit Courier Trend 1.5 is a practical compact van with efficient diesel power and versatile cargo space. It's ideal for urban delivery and small business needs.

FORD.Name: Jakobs 1992 LX Mustang Fast and Furious
FORD.global_information: The Jakobs 1992 LX Mustang from Fast and Furious is an iconic custom build with aggressive styling and boosted V8 power. It's a tribute to the movie's legendary street racing heritage.

FORD.Name: Range Rover Sport 2018
FORD.global_information: The 2018 Range Rover Sport combines luxury, off-road excellence, and sporty dynamics. With powerful engines and premium features, it's a versatile high-end SUV for all terrains.

lexus.Name: 2017 Lexus LC 500 Artisan Spirits Black Label GT
lexus.global_information: The 2017 Lexus LC 500 with Artisan Spirits Black Label GT widebody kit is an aggressive custom grand tourer featuring flared fenders, massive aero, and enhanced styling. Built on the potent 5.0L V8 platform, it delivers stunning looks and thrilling performance for enthusiasts seeking standout presence.

lexus.Name: 2017 Lexus LC 500 Rowen
lexus.global_information: The 2017 Lexus LC 500 Rowen features a dramatic Japanese tuner body kit with extensions, spoilers, and aggressive aero upgrades. It amplifies the LC's elegant design into a bold, eye-catching masterpiece while retaining the smooth V8 power and luxury ride.

lexus.Name: 2017 Lexus LC 500
lexus.global_information: The 2017 Lexus LC 500 is a stunning grand tourer with breathtaking design, a high-revving 5.0L V8 producing 471 hp, and exceptional handling. It blends luxury, performance, and innovative engineering for an unforgettable driving experience.

lexus.Name: 2023 Lexus GX 550 Overtrail
lexus.global_information: The 2023 Lexus GX 550 Overtrail is a rugged luxury SUV built for adventure, featuring 33-inch all-terrain tires, twin-turbo V6 power, and advanced off-road tech. It combines premium comfort with serious trail capability.

lexus.Name: 2025 Lexus LX 700h
lexus.global_information: The 2025 Lexus LX 700h is the flagship hybrid SUV with massive power from twin-turbo V6 and electric assist, delivering 457 hp and exceptional torque. It offers luxury, off-road prowess, and improved efficiency in a commanding package.

lexus.Name: Lexus IS300 200
lexus.global_information: The Lexus IS300 200 (first-gen) is a classic sport sedan with a smooth-revving 3.0L inline-6 engine and rear-wheel drive dynamics. It offers balanced handling, reliability, and timeless appeal for driving enthusiasts.

lexus.Name: Lexus LM Hybrid
lexus.global_information: The Lexus LM Hybrid is an ultra-luxury minivan with self-charging hybrid power, offering supreme comfort in 4- or 7-seater configurations. It's designed for chauffeur-driven elegance with advanced tech and serene ride quality.

lexus.Name: Lexus LS 500 F Sport
lexus.global_information: The Lexus LS 500 F Sport is a flagship luxury sedan blending athletic styling, twin-turbo V6 power, and refined handling. It delivers executive comfort with sporty dynamics and cutting-edge technology.

lexus.Name: Lexus SC GT500
lexus.global_information: The Lexus SC430 GT500 is a legendary Super GT race car with massive power and advanced aero. It dominated Japanese motorsport with victories and championships, showcasing Lexus engineering in extreme competition.
